alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:21PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, southeastern Walton and southern Washington Counties through 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/... At 421 PM EDT/321 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Vernon to 8 miles north of Lynn Haven to 9 miles south of Panama City Beach. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Live Oak, Parker, Ebro, Allanton, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry and Bennett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
